press_button.description: Press the button to switch the dishwasher.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to remove dirt and stains.

press_dishwasher_button.description: Press the button to start/stop the dishwasher.

rotate_door.description: Rotate the door of the dishwasher for cleaning the interior.

clean_rotation_door.description: Clean the rotation door to maintain hygiene.

wipe_door.description: Wipe the door to remove any dirt or grime.

clean_body.description: Clean the body of the dishwasher for maintaining the exterior.

check_status_dishwasher_body.description: Check the status of the dishwasher body.

clean_dishwasher_body.description: Clean the dishwasher body to remove any dirt or grime.

clean_dishwasher.description: Clean the entire dishwasher including the button, rotation door, and body.

check_status_dishwasher.description: Check if the dishwasher is clean and functioning properly.

clean_entire_dishwasher.description: Clean the entire dishwasher, including the button, door, and dishwasher body.
